title: Gustakh Dil
overview: A story of Sitara and Faras whose life gets entirely changes after one incident. Both of them become guilty of each other for that particular incident, but they know the innocence of each other. Sitara who is an introvert and sensitive girl and already surviving through a horrible trauma in her earlier life, is engaged with her cousin Saif. Faras who is well educated and handling his family business is in love with his fiancé Sawera who is a daughter of his father's friend and business partner. Both of them met each other in a shopping mall where fiancé, of Sitara, Saif introduce her to his university friend Faras. During the conversation Saif had to leave immediately leaving Sitara behind with Faras and asks him to meet downstairs. Faras and Sitara Jahan get into an elevator where she gets flash backs from her past and gets fainted, the circumstances go against each other and both of them had to marry. How Faras would be able to make Sitara happy and recovered from her past memories?
